profile.description: Passionate about software development and technology, I am characterized by my constant pursuit of challenges and my commitment to professional growth. I find motivation in exploring the vast technological landscape, always seeking new knowledge to enrich my career. In my free time, I compete online in chess, a game that stimulates my strategic ability, and I exercise in the gym to maintain a balance between mind and body. Football is also part of my recreational activities, providing me with moments of disconnection and fun.

data_experience.title: Full Stack Developer
data_experience.description: I improved and optimized a collections module, managing all advisor sales and various points, increasing its performance and usability by 75%, ensuring accuracy and reliability in the handling of figures and money. I designed and created a comprehensive module for the efficient control of all the company's assets, providing a complete vision and a detailed history, allowing all assets to be managed effectively. Developed REST API services that improved communication between various parts of the system, facilitating integration and increasing interoperability.

data_experience.title: Frontend Developer
data_experience.description: I optimized the geolocation of the La Rebaja project, achieving an 80% increase in speed and readability. Performed extensive testing of interfaces to identify and resolve usability and display issues. Developed mobile and web applications with Vtex IO, ensuring a fluid and efficient user experience.

data.title: Cryp Wallet - Virtual cryptocurrency wallet
data.description: Cryp Wallet is a virtual cryptocurrency wallet that allows you to buy, send, exchange and receive cryptocurrencies safely and efficiently. Developed with modern technologies, Cryp Wallet offers an intuitive and functional interface, adapting to both new users and experienced investors in the world of cryptocurrencies:
